headers.Location: URI to access the uploaded content resource. Looks like - `https://atlas.microsoft.com/spatialData/{udid}?api-version=1.0&subscription-key={subscription-key}`
URI to check the current status of the long-running upload request. Looks like - `https://atlas.microsoft.com/spatialData/{udid}/status?api-version=1.0&subscription-key={subscription-key}`

error.message: Upload data request failed. We encountered the following problems with your data:
Bad request: one or more parameters were incorrectly specified or are mutually exclusive.
Access denied due to invalid subscription key. Make sure to provide a valid key for an active subscription.
Not Found: the requested resource could not be found, but it may be available again in the future.
An error occurred while processing the request. Please try again later.
